dublin_core.dcvalue: We analyzed the server logs of the PubMed for Handhelds portal for a 30 day period defined user characteristics and used a smartphone to do typical MEDLINE searches We then determined the amount of data exchanged between server and mobile device Wireless Web access can be a useful tool to the mobile clinician Daily data usage could reach megabyte levels
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
The cost of being wireless: a usage analysis of the 'PubMed for Handhelds' portal at the point-of-care.
